home.title: Stroganov Solo Helper
home.play1: Play against Ivan or Katyusha, the Solo Mode opponents of Stroganov.
home.play2: This helper application replaces the automa cards, and helps setting up the game with various difficulty levels. It's possible to play against up to three Ivans or Katyushas. The Turukhan expansion is supported.

players.multipleBots: Playing against multiple solo opponents is not supported by the rules. You have to make copies of Ivans player board.

difficultyLevel.title: Difficulty Level
difficultyLevel.mediumInfo: Whenever Ivan doesn't have the right fur to fully perform his additional action, he gains 1 coin instead.
difficultyLevel.hardInfo: Whenever Ivan gains a fur with the same value as the fur on the trade action space, he gains one coin instead.
difficultyLevel.playerBoardB: You can use one of the asymmetrical "Б" sides of the player boards to make the game easier for you.

newLandscapeTile.title: If the opponent acquires and A or Б landscape tile...
newLandscapeTile.getATile: Whenever Ivan obtains an A-tile he will immediately score 4 victory points. He does not use the benefit of the tile during the game but does count the tile for set collection.
newLandscapeTile.getBTile: Whenever Ivan acquires a Б-tile he immediately uses it to gain the benefit by paying one banner if able. If unable to pay a banner, he does not claim the benefit.
newLandscapeTile.bTileSummerStart: At the start of each summer Ivan will use the benefit of his previously acquired Б-tiles, provided he has enough banners to do so. If he has multiple Б-tiles and insufficient banners to use all of them, he will activate them in chronological order of acquisition, starting with the one he acquired first.
newLandscapeTile.settlementOfYurtsTile: If Ivan acquires the “Settlement of yurts” Б-tile, Ivan will always choose the yurt tile that gives five story points.
